### runOnLoopBlock() {#aa49945a8b5fe4f745812063bff3a905a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool HexagonLoopIdiomRecognize::runOnLoopBlock (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; CurLoop, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42; BECount, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; ExitBlocks)</>}>
runOnLoopBlock - <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process">Process</a> the specified block, which lives in a counted loop with the specified backedge count.

This block is known to be in the current loop and not in any subloops.
